definitions: the action of marking with a branding iron

examples.text: regulations concerning the branding, movement, and sale of cattle

shortDefinitions: action of marking with a branding iron

definitions: the action of describing someone or something as having a particular bad or shameful quality

examples.text: the branding of so many schools as failing has vexed school officials around the country

shortDefinitions: action of describing someone as having bad quality

definitions: the promotion of a particular product or company by means of advertising and distinctive design

examples.text: the process of branding should be considered in global terms
the key principles of successful branding

definitions: distinctive wording or design used to identify a particular brand

examples.text: the first thing you'll notice is the cool blue branding
the only difference was a minor change in the branding of the service
when it comes to branding, we know that design matters

shortDefinitions: wording or design used to identify brand’
